devdoc.author: Aaron Boyd <https://github.com/aaronmboyd>
devdoc.details: Administrative and orchestrator contract for the Celo UBI program

params._disbursementWei: New value of wei to disburse to beneficiaries

params._ubiAddress: Celo address of the UBI Beneficiary

params._txId: Raw transaction ID for this event
Raw transaction ID for this event

getBeneficiaryAddressAtIndex(uint256).details: Used for iterating the complete list of beneficiaries

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Requirements: The contract must not be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._txId: Raw transaction ID for this event

transferOwnership(address).details: In this override, we iterate all the existing UBIBeneficiary contracts and change their owner before changing the owner of the core contract

unpause().details: Requirements: The contract must be paused.

withdrawToCustodian().details: The contract must be pausedSends cUSD to current custodian from the current reconciliation account

devdoc.title: Celo UBI administrative contract

DisbursementUpdated(uint256).notice: Triggered when the disbursement amount is changed

FactoryUpdated(address,address).notice: Triggered when the UBI Beneficiary Factory is updated

NewUser(bytes32,address).notice: Triggered when a new user has been created

authorize(bytes32,string,uint256).notice: Authorizes an amount for a UBI beneficiary

balanceOfUBIBeneficiary(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the available balance of a UBI beneficiary

deauthorize(bytes32,string).notice: Deauthorizes an amount for a UBI beneficiary

setUBIBeneficiaryFactory(address).notice: Public update to a new UBI Beneficiary Factory

settle(bytes32,string,uint256).notice: Settles an amount for a UBI Beneficiary and transfers to the Reconciliation account

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawToCustodian().notice: Emergency withdrawal of all remaining cUSD to the custodian account
